insights.title: Low Memory Creation Rate
insights.description: You're creating less than 1 memory per day on average. Consider setting daily reflection reminders.
insights.action: Set up daily prompts to record important moments and thoughts.

insights.title: Late Night Usage
insights.description: You tend to use the system late at night. Consider morning reflection routines.
insights.action: Try starting your day with a morning check-in instead of evening sessions.

insights.title: Limited Memory Types
insights.description: You're focusing on few types of memories. Try recording different aspects of your life.
insights.action: Experiment with logging habits, health notes, and social interactions.

insights.title: Health Tracking Opportunity
insights.description: You haven't recorded any health-related memories yet.
insights.action: Consider tracking medications, symptoms, or wellness activities.

recommendations.title: Build Your Memory Foundation
recommendations.description: Start by recording 5-10 important memories to establish patterns.

recommendations.title: Optimize Usage Timing
recommendations.description: Consider shifting some activities to daytime hours for better balance.

recommendations.title: Expand Memory Categories
recommendations.description: Try recording memories from different areas of your life.
